name: FarmNer
description:
** IMPORTANT ** 

Controls for FarmNer:

" E " to Attack (Hold).
" WASD " to Move & " SHIFT " to Sprint. 
" Left-Click " to Interact.
" Right-Click " to Turn Flashlight On/Off.
" H " or " Q " to Heal.
" Escape " to Pause.

Have fun. ;)

** IMPORTANT ** 

Your daughter has gone missing. You have followed footsteps next to a path to what seems to be an abandoned farmland. There are torches still glowing hot, where is everyone? Find your daughter, quickly!

This is my second ever game created in the Godot game engine. I have learned a lot from creating this game, and hope to get started soon on the next one!

Credits - 

Programmer - Jayden Sipe

Art Work - angrysnail

Ideas - Leyla Sipe
